com.crawljax.core
Class CrawljaxController

java.lang.Object
  com.crawljax.core.CrawljaxController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrawlQueueManager
public class CrawljaxController
extends Object
implements CrawlQueueManager

The Crawljax Controller class is the core of Crawljax.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
mesbah

               throws CrawljaxException,

getSession

public CrawlSession getSession()
Retrieve the current session, there is only one session active at a time. So this method by it self is Thread-Safe but actions on the session are NOT!

Returns:
the session

addWorkToQueue

public final void addWorkToQueue(Crawler work)
Add work (Crawler) to the Queue of work that need to be done. The class is thread-safe.

Specified by:
addWorkToQueue in interface CrawlQueueManager
Parameters:
work - the work (Crawler) to add to the Queue

removeWorkFromQueue

public boolean removeWorkFromQueue(Crawler crawler)
Removes this Crawler from the workQueue if it is present, thus causing it not to be run if it has not already started.

Specified by:
removeWorkFromQueue in interface CrawlQueueManager
Parameters:
crawler - the Crawler to remove
Returns:
true if the crawler was removed

doBrowserWait

public final void doBrowserWait(EmbeddedBrowser browser)
Wait for a given condition. This call is thread safe as the underlying object is thread-safe.

Parameters:
browser - the browser which requires a wait condition

getStrippedDom

public String getStrippedDom(EmbeddedBrowser browser)
TODO Stefan: Remove this synchronization; performance loss is huge! no synchrnization fails because ThreadLocal is not ThreadSafe??? get the stripped version of the dom currently in the browser. This call is thread safe, must be synchronised because there is thread-intefearing bug in the stateComparator.

Parameters:
browser - the browser instance.
Returns:
a stripped string of the DOM tree taken from the browser.

private String formatRunningTime()

the formatted time in X min, X sec layout.

terminate

public final void terminate(boolean isAbort)
Terminate the crawling, Stop all threads this will cause the controller which is sleeping to reactive and do the final work....

Specified by:
terminate in interface CrawlQueueManager
Parameters:
isAbort - if set true the terminate must be as an abort not allowing running PostCrawling plugins.

shutdown

private void shutdown(long timeCrawlCalc)
The general shutdown procedure without running plugins or using browsers.

getElementChecker

public final ExtractorManager getElementChecker()
The current element checker in use. This call is thread-safe because it returns a final field.

Returns:
the elementChecker used to register the checked elements.

getCrawlQueueManager

public CrawlQueueManager getCrawlQueueManager()
Return the used CrawlQueueManager, this method is designed for extension purposes. Being able to move the addWorkToQueue(Crawler) and removeWorkFromQueue(Crawler) out of this class using the interface.

Returns:
the crawlQueueManager that is used.

waitForTermination

public void waitForTermination()
                        throws InterruptedException
Description copied from interface: CrawlQueueManager
Block (Wait) until all the work for this queue has been finished.

Specified by:
waitForTermination in interface CrawlQueueManager
Throws:
InterruptedException - when the blocking thread gets interupted.
